amendment.description: An amendment to strike "Education and Labor" and insert "Science, Space and Technology" in section 8.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Ross.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
